===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A sugar-coated or film-coated tablet used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "dispel ''wind and remove toxic heat'' from the nose, when indicated by symptoms of acute and chronic sinusitis".

Biyan tablets contain the following ingredients:

|连翘

|野菊花
|-

|五味子
|-

|桔梗
|-
| {{l|la|radix|Radix}} {{l|mul|Angelica dahurica|Angelicae Dahuricae}}

|知母

|荆芥
|-

|黄柏
